Japanese: 経験値ブースト!
アクセサリーアップグレード!
武器ソケット作成！
パーティー経験値ブースト!
ゴールデンアイバットを探せ!

English: Kill the Golden Aibatt in dungeons and get drop bonuses!
Japanese: ダンジョンでゴールデンアイバットを倒し、ドロップボーナスを手に入れよう!
ナイトブースト!
ゲーム内の夜間中は獲得経験値+30%のようだ！
夜が始まる...！獲得経験値が1.3倍になったようだ！

English: The sun is up, x1.3 EXP has ended...
Japanese: 朝日が顔を出し、獲得経験値1.3倍は終わってしまった...！
イースターイベント

English: Complete Eggcellent's Meadow to get Pink Easter Eggs!
Japanese: エッグセレントの牧草地をクリアしてピンクのイースターエッグを手に入れよう!
春のイベント!
天空のダイヤモンド

English: Destroy the stars in the night sky to obtain star fragments!
Japanese: 夜空の星を破壊して星のかけらを手に入れよう!

English: Night has come! The stars are coming out. Find them in the sky!
Japanese: 夜になり、星が出現しているようだ...。夜空を飛んで探してみよう！

English: Nighttime has passed, the stars are disappearing.
Japanese: 夜が過ぎ、星が消えていく。
ダンジョンコイン割引!

English: Spend fewer Dungeon Coins when taking on missions or entering dungeons!
Japanese: ミッション挑戦時、ダンジョン入場時に消費するダンジョンコインを節約しよう！
1周年記念!

English: Flyff Universe is turning 1! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Japanese: FlyFFユニバースが1周年を迎えます!このマイルストーンを可能にしてくれたプレイヤーの皆さん、本当にありがとうございました!
1周年記念アテンダント

English: Log in each day for 40 minutes to receive rewards!
Japanese: 毎日40分間ログインして報酬を受け取りましょう!
Flyff世界選手権
FWCレベルリーチ

English: Reach new levels during the event period and receive rewards! Only on the Flyff World Championship server!
Japanese: イベント期間中に新たなレベルに到達して報酬を獲得しよう!Flyff World Championshipサーバーでのみ!

English: Exchange FWC Gear with [FWC Manager] Ava to get more rewards!
Japanese: [FWCマネージャー]エヴァでFWCギアを交換して、より多くの報酬を獲得しましょう!

English: The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted EXP and Drops and compete for exceptional prizes!
Japanese: #bFlyff World Championship#nbは、2023年9月7日まで開催される世界大会です。ブーストされた経験値とドロップでこのサーバーに参加して、特別な賞品を獲得しましょう!
もこもち!
アップグレード！
抽選！

English: Earn coins by defeating monsters or completing quests, then spend them at the Gacha Machine to receive exceptional rewards!
Japanese: モンスターを倒したり、NPCガチャマシンのクエストを完了したりしてコインを獲得し、特別な報酬を受け取りましょう!
ドロップブースト!
スーツピアス!
フリフ音楽祭!

English: Collect Music Notes and Music Score Scrolls from monsters and exchange them with Bach.
Japanese: モンスターから音符と楽譜の巻物を集めてNPCバッハと交換する
パーティー経験値+30%!
シークレットブースト!
プライベートレオを救出!
石の雨!
アップグレードストーンをドロップ!

English: Player Survey! Aim for special rewards!
Japanese: ユーザーアンケート実施中！特別な報酬をGETしよう！
詳細はこちらへ！https://linktr.ee/flyffuniverse
オクトーバーフェスト！
狩りの時間

English: It's been a bumper year, so there are a lot of monsters out to get crops.\nIt's time to hunt them down! Can you help?
Japanese: 今年は豊作の年だったので、作物を獲るためにたくさんのモンスターがいます。彼らを追い詰める時が来ました!手伝ってもらえますか?

ハロウィーンの世界のボス
泥棒サンタを捕まえる

Japanese: 1.3アップデートアンケート実施中！特別な報酬をGETしよう！

English: Exchange letters with a loved one or friend to complete the phrases below!
Japanese: 愛する人や友人と手紙を交換して、以下のフレーズを完成させてください!!
50ポイント

English: Let's celebrate the 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!
Japanese: Flyff Universeの2周年を祝いましょう!
2周年記念!

English: Flyff Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Japanese: FlyFFユニバースが2周年を迎えます!このマイルストーンを可能にしてくれたプレイヤーの皆さんに心から感謝します!

English: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon to earn a permanent costume!
Japanese: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon to earn a permanent costume!

English: Complete Daily Quests to earn dice, then roll them for rewards!
Japanese: Complete Daily Quests to earn dice, then roll them for rewards!
Flyff's 20th Anniversary
Celebrate Flyff's 20th Anniversary!

English: Plunder treasure from the Pirate Ship!
Japanese: Plunder treasure from the Pirate Ship!

English: Log in each day for 30 minutes to receive rewards!
Japanese: Log in each day for 30 minutes to receive rewards!

English: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!
Japanese: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!
Japanese: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!
Life Mastery Event

English: Increase all life mastery gains by 20%!
Japanese: Increase all life mastery gains by 20%!

English: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!
Japanese: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!
Life Production Speed Event

English: Increase your life production speed by 20%!
Japanese: Increase your life production speed by 20%!
Life Gathering Durability Discount Event!

English: Reduces durability cost by 1 when gathering!
Japanese: Reduces durability cost by 1 when gathering!

English: Life Wandering Merchant Early Refresh Event!
Japanese: Life Wandering Merchant Early Refresh Event!

English: The Wandering Merchant's inventory refreshes 30 minutes earlier during the event!
Japanese: The Wandering Merchant's inventory refreshes 30 minutes earlier during the event!

English: 20% more gathering objects spawn during the event!
Japanese: 20% more gathering objects spawn during the event!

Japanese: Life Wandering Merchant Extra Stock Event!

Japanese: The Wandering Merchant offers 2 additional items for sale during the event!

It's Time to Upgrade!

English: Successfully upgrade an item to each level from +1 to +10 during the event to receive rewards. Complete all 10 stages to receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
Japanese: Successfully upgrade an item to each level from +1 to +10 during the event to receive rewards. Complete all 10 stages to receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
Public Test Server

English: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the Discord for more information.
Japanese: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the Discord for more information.
2026 Valentine's Day

English: During the 2026 Valentine's Day Event, I♥YOU items can be obtained from the Valentine's Day Letter, which drops from defeated monsters; only monsters up to 10 levels below your character's level are eligible to drop the item.
Japanese: During the 2026 Valentine's Day Event, I♥YOU items can be obtained from the Valentine's Day Letter, which drops from defeated monsters; only monsters up to 10 levels below your character's level are eligible to drop the item.
